alert.note: Alert for Kidder (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 23 at 9:54PM CDT until May 23 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL KIDDER COUNTY... At 953 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Steele, or 39 miles east of Bismarck, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 947 PM CDT, quarter size hail was reported 3 miles north northwest of Steele. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Kidder County. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
